contentLists.heading: How much time and cost does it take to build a Shopify eCommerce portal?
contentLists.content: The development cost and time required to build a Shopify eCommerce store completely rely on the client’s requirements and project size. It also depends on other factors like advanced features and functionalities to be developed in an eCommerce store. To know the precise details, connect with us today, or you can directly email us at info@techtic.com. We will precisely respond to your queries as quickly as possible.

contentLists.heading: What are the diverse hiring models for Shopify development projects?
contentLists.content: We provide a fixed time or price model or dedicated resource project model for your eCommerce store development. You can decide on the hiring model as per the delivery of your services and project demands

contentLists.heading: Which project management tools will you utilize to monitor my Shopify eCommerce Project?
contentLists.content: The project management tools we use include Trello, Slack, Jira, and Basecamp.

contentLists.heading: Are your built Shopify stores mobile and search engine friendly?
contentLists.content: Yes, Our Shopify development teams develop mobile-friendly & search engine-friendly eCommerce stores. We precisely follow responsive benchmarks and make sure that the Shopify eCommerce store is compatible with different screen sizes. We rigorously follow all Google Webmaster and other Search engine guidelines while building all the eCommerce store projects.

contentLists.heading: Do I own the ownership of my Shopify eCommerce project code?
contentLists.content: Yes. We will hand over the code after the completion of the Shopify eCommerce project. However, it relies on the NDA terms in some scenarios and where we will claim ownership.

contentLists.heading: Do you provide me technical support and maintenance after my project?
contentLists.content: Yes. Our Shopify developers teams will provide support and assist you with new features, maintenance, and frequent upgrades.
